title: Burghers of Calais--influence on later artists

content.question: Rodinâ€™s representation of the figures was influential on later artists mainly because of the

choices.label: grouping that privileges a single viewpoint
harmonic proportions and use of contrapposto
deliberate anonymity and lack of specific attributes
emotional impact and lack of idealization

content.answer: emotional impact and lack of idealization

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
